column9: Lovely restaurant with a Nordic touch. Great food and service with an emphasis on local and seasonal produce and combinations of texture. We had fish and set menu respectively, everything was teriffic but especially the coconut dessert on offer.
We had a dinner that exceeded my (high) expectations. 12 course menu where every course was different and surprising.

We ate lunch at På Skissernas when we visited Skissernas museum.
The staff was friendly and attentive. The atmosphere is Scandinavian modern with beautiful interior.
We had a lovely meal. It tasted great! It is on the pricey side. A main dish at lunch was...More

By day, I suspect this place is more of a coffee shop for the museum.  At night, they offer an variety of well prepared and interesting snacks, starters, main courses and desserts.  Our waiter, while swamped with two very large parties, was engaging and attentive...More

The restaurant is located at the entrance of the museum. The style is quite modern, but neat and elegant.
The menu offers a bit limited selection for lunch, with the prices being on the high side.
I took the daily, which was a pork chop...More
Had the turbot for lunch, accompanied with a crispy white wine. The fish was absolutely delicious served with a fantastic sauce and freshly cooked vegetables. Highly recommended restaurant.

The modern building and the haute cuisine dominates. The place is not cosy or friendly. The acoustics is far from perfect, it's difficult to have a conversation. The meal tasted good though and hade interesting combinations of various tastes.

We visited På Skissernas for a Friday lunch and chose the dish of the day. Before the main course, we were served a small, very tasty salad and some amazing bread. The food was exciting, nicely presented and full of flavors. The small dessert served...More

column7: Elegantly served food with great taste
column9: The food and ambient atmosphere was very good. I had the cod, and it was perfectly juicy and tasty. They bake their own bread which was so flavoury and nice. The waiter was good at advising on wine and he was also very attentive when...More

I was at lunch with my daughter at this nice restaurant. They have “Menu of the Day”, but my daughter preferred “A la Carte”, so we ordered that. I took “Pluma” a dish made of pork, wine and to dessert “Hjortron” Cloudberry); very delicious ....More
